TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class CacheSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序配置全局缓存设置。

span.span: Configures the global cache settings for an ASP.NET application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `` section of a configuration file. ASP.NET 缓存功能由类。The ASP.NET caching feature is implemented by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce)。For more information, see [Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce). > [!NOTE] > 可以将信息写入根据定义的部分属性的限制的配置文件的相关节其值是。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在层次结构不允许层次结构中的配置文件中写入任何尝试会对由分析器生成的错误消息中。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，此类可用于读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 缓存是一个用于存储经常访问的数据的特定于应用程序的哈希表。A cache is an application-specific hash table used to store frequently accessed data. 应用程序和会话状态是类似于缓存中，正在非常类似，由于其应用程序范围的应用程序状态。Application and session state are similar to the cache, the application state being the most similar, due to its application-wide scope. 缓存和应用程序状态机制之间的最大差异之一是缓存支持这种依赖性，使得可以在生成应用程序发生某些事件时，会自动删除缓存的项的依赖关系。One of the biggest differences between the cache and the application-state mechanism is that the cache supports dependencies These dependencies make it possible to build applications that automatically remove cached items when certain events occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个页面和相关的代码文件用于访问节特性。The following code example shows a page and the related code file used to access the section attributes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultProvider { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultProvider : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置默认提供程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the default provider.
The default provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisableExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已禁用缓存过期。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache expiration is disabled.

value.span: 如果缓存过期被禁用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cache expiration is disabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，永不过期的缓存的项。If the property is set to `true`, the cached items never expire. 此设置被为了帮助调试应用程序代码中的缓存行为。This setting is intended to help debug cache behavior in application code. 时要格外小心禁用缓存过期时间，因为这可能会导致项目缓存的时间超过它们是有效的。Use caution when disabling cache expiration, as this might result in items being cached longer than they are valid. > [!NOTE] > 若要添加到输出缓存的页，必须建立该页面的过期策略。To add a page to the output cache, you must establish an expiration policy for that page. 你可以执行此操作以声明方式与[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令或以编程方式使用方法。You can do this declaratively with the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or programmatically using the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 为 ASP.NET 页面缓存设置过期值](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c8931600-b167-477d-bd5a-0186ac908646)。For more information, see [How to: Set Expiration Values for ASP.NET Page Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c8931600-b167-477d-bd5a-0186ac908646). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableMemoryCollection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisableMemoryCollection : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已禁用缓存内存收集。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache memory collection is disabled.

value.span: 如果缓存内存收集已禁用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cache memory collection is disabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，对缓存相关 API 的调用将产生任何影响。If the property is set to `true`, calls to the cache-related API will have no effect. 如果属性设置为`true`，缓存不会尝试收集未使用的项。If the property is set to `true`, the cache does not attempt to collect unused items. 请小心使用此设置，因为禁用内存集合快速将导致应用程序的内存不足条件。Use caution when using this setting, as disabling memory collection can quickly lead to Out of Memory conditions for the application. 此设置不起 ASP.NET 内部缓存在或上输出缓存。This setting has no effect on the ASP.NET internal cache or on the output cache. 有关不同类型的缓存的详细信息，请参阅[Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce)。For more information about the different types of cache, see [Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PercentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PercentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示虚拟内存使用的最大百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum percentage of virtual memory usage.

value.span: 虚拟内存使用的最大百分比。

span.span: The maximum percentage of virtual memory usage.
The default value is 90%.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定高压力条件的阈值。The property specifies the threshold for high pressure conditions. 如在达到此阈值，则缓存系统逐渐开始更积极的清理措施。As this threshold is approached, the cache system gradually begins more aggressive scavenging measures. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long PrivateBytesLimit { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.PrivateBytesLimit : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作进程私有空间的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum size of the working-process private space.

value.span: 为工作进程分配的私有空间的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum number, in bytes, of the private space allocated to the working process.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定高压力条件的阈值。The property specifies the threshold for high pressure conditions. 如在达到此阈值，则缓存系统逐渐开始更积极的清理措施。As this threshold is approached, the cache system gradually begins more aggressive scavenging measures. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PrivateBytesPollTime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PrivateBytesPollTime : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示两次轮询辅助进程内存使用情况的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval between polling for the worker-process memory usage.

value.span: 两次轮询辅助进程内存使用情况的时间间隔。

span.span: The time interval between polling for the worker process memory usage.
The default value is 2 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此轮询很高，可能需要进行调整，缓存修整算法的反应速度和轮询作出的调用数之间的权衡。This polling is expensive and might need to be adjusted as a tradeoff between reaction speed of the cache-trimming algorithm and number of polling calls made.
